note: I am a software developer in Austin, Texas leading a small team doing internal line of business applications. I consider myself a reformed database bigot on the path to developing applications with a focus on testability and maintainability. Currently, my focus is on .NET using Agile techniques including Continuous Integration, and collective code ownership.
